author: adityagupta1010
content: hey <@774033563732541451> <@755913785620824175> might be a vague question, but wanted to ask, like is there any summary regarding all the upgrades and tests that have been planned to be included in devnet-7?

author: jsign
content:
Reg the changes for devnet-7:
- The "big" change is implementing the gas changes discussed in Kenia. i.e: packing many account fields in a "BASIC_DATA" leaf. https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/8550/files
- Adding the parent state root in the witness (https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/pull/3785)
- https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/8753/files#diff-a7ef47379aef6f6303eb68f28f81141850cf251c93d57e93dc4f5ed6f9b4b94bR165
- (Note: FILL_COSTs where left out for devnet7 and prob happen in a further devnet)
Other useful living doc reg vic calls: https://notes.ethereum.org/@rudolf/vic-notes

Reg tests: The intention decided in the last VIC is to actually solve many of the open problems in the testing framework and `evm` to fill as many tests I prepared some months ago, so there isn't a decided "list". We're literally working on that nowâ€”these last days we're making very good progress. I'll share how far we went in the next VIC and which fixtures will be ready to be run so we can catch bugs much faster before launching devnet7.
